commits.msg:
This is the initial commit of the savanna puppet module.

Installs the OpenStack savanna UI and backend. Example of
use can be seen in example/example.pp

Change-Id: I3b994f70690078d37a42308f9985712e2f398924
Implements: blueprint puppet-savanna

Fixes installing development builds

Changes installing development builds to native resources. Fixed installing
python-pip instead of git package

Closes-Bug: #1294622
Closes-Bug: #1294621

Change-Id: I40bc135c12593bc90742f8cedc33fa2740fef2c9

Updating the puppet module to reference Sahara

Updating savanna references to become sahara.  This
is necessary after the project renaming effort.

Change-Id: I82026692d1e0a6e6fb511fda679361c218b49ce2
Closes-Bug:  bug 1316136

Adding RHEL support for puppet-sahara

Adding a section to install for redhat-based
systems.
* adding require mysql::server
* adding sahara-api-redhat.erb template
* adding section to install that uses the new
  template to build an init.d script
* updates for compatibility with latest versions
  of puppet modules
  

Change-Id: Idecde095040cf2ed31f81ac058aed526224aa73e
Closes-Bug:  bug 1295342

Allowing for RPM-based installation

Now supporting $rpm_install for the case where
a user wants to install from an rpm-based repo.
* rpm_install flag (false by default)
* now using "data_processing" in service endpoint
* initializing db schema at end of install

Change-Id: I71ad51e418b0579d1b048778ac550adc504f53b9
Closes-Bug:  bug 1322626

Refactorise Keystone resources management

Refactorise the code of Keystone resources management with backward
compatibility since we don't modify the unit tests.

Also add puppet-keystone in metadata.json.

Change-Id: I85ad9f21a15daa3f0fcd82fcf75c7157a8223a40
Implements: blueprint common-openstack-identity-resource

Rewrite puppet-sahara from scratch

During the Kilo summit, we talked about the state of the current
puppet-sahara module on stackforge, and especially about the brought up parity with
other modules.

For theses reasons, the rewrite was launched/leaded by Robbie Harwood,
but directly coded on Github (and not in a feature branch in this
repository), for this reason, this patch is non-atomic, and import the
latest frozencemetery/puppet-sahara version¹.

This rewrite/import was approved on puppet-openstack mailing list
(following this thread²).

The «reset» of the stackforge repo was discussed (in order to keep the history
of Robbie module) on #openstack-infra, but it seems we have no simple solution.

¹https://github.com/frozencemetery/puppet-sahara/commit/05af265b15eb3c4e1682ab3fc6dc8b6d750d3e36
²https://groups.google.com/a/puppetlabs.com/forum/#!topic/puppet-openstack/0BETdNvrd70

Co-Authored-By: Robbie Harwood <rharwood@redhat.com>
Change-Id: Ic3dd7547fdfcba275d8a8b90b8ba84bc3ce1d7c0

Migrate postgresql backend to use openstacklib::db::postgresql

Let migrate to the new openstacklib::db::postgresql helper for
postgresql backend. This commit also unpin postgresql fixture
(openstacklib support now the latest version of postgre module).

Change-Id: I2040aff154f57af2ed9ae3d689ebf3af092b6525
Implements: blueprint commmon-openstack-database-resource

policy.json: Allow one to manage them from the puppet module

This commit allow a deployer to manage the policies via this module
It relies on augeas to change only the policy needed. The init takes
a hash of policies and apply them.

http://docs.openstack.org/developer/sahara/userdoc/configuration.guide.html#sahara-policy-configuration

Change-Id: I7c58cfaee285293647f9c5a23aacdd37e7289f99

add back availability to manage logging and syslog confs

This commit add back the possibility to manage syslog (inc. facility)
and flat log files (log_dir).

Thanks Luigi for the request!

Change-Id: I09daa6ed84d626c4ccef886ad9d2e3019ca48c4b

Add Puppet 4.x lint checks

- This changes the puppet-lint requirement to 1.1.x, so that we can use
  puppet-lint plugins. Most of these plugins are for 4.x compat, but
  some just catch common errors.

Change-Id: I6d5fd429096041342f7f30122da60471790ed9ac
Signed-off-by: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>

Tag all Sahara packages

Some users wish to override the default package provider by their own.

Tag all packages with the 'openstack' to allow mass resource attributes
override using resource collectors.

Change-Id: Ic662043bcd19a930a47a6716be051561fceef5d7
Closes-bug: #1391209
Signed-off-by: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>

Makes kombu_ssl_* parameters optional when rabbit_use_ssl => true

The kombu_ssl_* parameters should not be required when rabbit_use_ssl => true
Rather, rabbit_use_ssl must be set to true if the kombu_ssl_* parameters are
used.

Change-Id: I5ddd3d0910094c31352243d3b674dff79e891dda
Closes-Bug: 1356083

MySQL: change default MySQL collate to utf8_general_ci

Install & configure MySQL database by using utf8_general_ci collation
which is the way documented in OpenStack [1] and already the default
in puppetlabs-mysql [2].

[1] http://goo.gl/GA5gyZ
[2] https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mysql/blob/master/manifests/db.pp#L7

Change-Id: Icc9150a71139d21df25a428cf266903e278a8949
Closes-bug: #1446375

Allow to deploy on Ubuntu

Sahara is now packaged for Ubuntu (UCA).

Change-Id: Iea6f39d3a4bda45c8703b65c0dff72b7e551f141
See: http://packages.ubuntu.com/vivid/sahara

Fix Sahara installation for Ubuntu

Because Sahara does not support SQLite, sahara-common will fail to be
installed if /etc/sahara/sahara.conf does not contain valid database
connection and if the database does not actually exist.

The patch aims to
* create 'sahara' group (we don't use to do that, but here we don't have
  the choice)
* create /etc/sahara & /etc/sahara/sahara.conf with right permissions
* orchestration to have Sahara working in one Puppet run

Change-Id: I4c9e9206e3e60f3c85224ae120516badb331672e
Closes-bug: #1450659

Idempotency fix

To keep Puppet run idempotent we have to avoid changing SELinux labels.

Change-Id: I3a14cb1e742ba376265149191c2c4bae03f5148e

Fixed /etc/sahara handling

This patch fixes:
- invalid order of package install and config modification
- invalid user to run db_sync

Change-Id: Ic946206dc930072c33e3e976062d5e26fd33f59e

Move rabbit/kombu settings to oslo_messaging_rabbit section

Kilo oslo-messaging deprecates rabbit/kombu settings in the
DEFAULT section.

Move these settings to proper oslo_messaging_rabbit section.

Change-Id: Ib38ce9ae158a51bc90e04114621d053611ef457a
Closes-bug: 1444161
Signed-off-by: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>

Introduce public_url, internal_url and admin_url

This change deprecates the following parameters:
- version (replaced by public/internal/admin_url)
- port (replaced by public/internal/admin_url)
- public_protocol (replaced by public_url)
- public_address (replaced by public_url)
- public_port (replaced by public_url)
- internal_protocol (replaced by internal_url)
- internal_address (replaced by internal_url)
- admin_protocol (replaced by admin_url)
- admin_address (replaced by admin_url)

Add deprecation warnings if any of those values are provided
while maintaining full backward compatibility.

Closes-bug: #1274979
Change-Id: Ib081308ad159841b32ce8eabd846c1567d2a3145

Enable tests for oslo_messaging_rabbit/rabbit_hosts parameter

The problem is that value for this parameter quotes in quote ',
but it should be double quotes ".

Change-Id: I3edf930d6b1928bc06a97632f53d90a0d405681f

Add sahara::config class

Other modules provide an X::config class to be able to specify
parameters that are not yet part of the module. Sahara was missing this
feature. This commit aims to add it for puppet-sahara.

Change-Id: Ie8bf79783ae32648dd10792de6d76eeb84877302

Add tag to package and service resources

In order to be able to take an action after all the packages of the
module have been installed/updated or all the services have been
started/restarted, we set a 'sahara-packaage' and 'sahara-service' tag
for each package and service of this module.

At the moment, there is a generic openstack tag that is not specific
enough if one wants to take action upon a single module change.

Use case :

If an action needs to be taken after all the packages have been
installed or updated : Package <| tag == 'sahara-package' |> -> X

Change-Id: Ie2ef4a09fbc83a7b97f1d1d5b1d12a3b3a643d34

Add support of SSL configuring for Sahara

Add support of SSL configuring for Sahara [1] (section
Description of CA and SSL configuration options).

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/kilo/config-reference/content/ch_configuring-sahara.html

Change-Id: I9683a5278e50d2bad32598ba8ffe843999ffc860

Creation of sahara::db::sync

In order to standardize the way dbsync are run across our modules,
we create a new class sahara::db::sync.
This class will be included if sync_db is enabled.

By making this transition the sahara::db::sync class
can be returned by the ENC.

A use case would be in an highly available environment, with 3 galera
nodes, include sahara on every node with sync_db set to false
and have the ENC return sahara::db::sync just for one node.

Change-Id: Ibdf6f86e546868b4fcfa0f530287e712934808fd

Add an ability to manage use_stderr parameter

When logging is already set up, it can be useful to disable this option
to avoid logs duplication (collected by Upstart, for example)

Change-Id: I996e156fe15ab2e667471e537755a5c728bcb97b
Closes-bug: #1482564

Update parameters for Sahara

Remove wrong and update parameters for sahara.conf

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/kilo/config-reference/content/ch_configuring-sahara.html

Change-Id: I222f5d63a7f0518ac04546915dcb12156840c8d4

Remove Sqlite validation for database_connection

Remove unneeded validation of database_connection for Sqlite,
because it is under case of unsupported db backend.

Change-Id: Id10bd0b598c350330fd4179c7311a900c4854b59

Configure rpc options separately from ceilometer notifications

Now all rpc backend configurations are setting with ceilometer
notifications. But ceilometer is optional service and rpc
should be configured separately.

Also added new tests for init.pp

Change-Id: I542a8b6ed3aaf18e4b352f821939fc5f262aa5eb

Add distribute mode for Sahara

Sahara can be configured to run in a distributed mode that creates
a separation between the API and Engine processes. This allows the
API process to remain relatively free to handle requests while
offloading intensive tasks to the engine processes. [1]

Also keep possibility to run old all-in-one mode.

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/developer/sahara/userdoc/advanced.configuration.guide.html#distributed-mode-configuration

Change-Id: Id3aa75229e8626c71d6cb8398af3c2c22f37b592

Introduce sahara::db class

Current modules [1,2,3] implements a <component>::db class that
is not implemented in Sahara. This commit aims to apply here the same logic.

[1] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-nova/blob/master/manifests/db.pp
[2] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-designate/blob/master/manifests/db.pp
[3] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-ceilometer/blob/master/manifests/db.pp

Change-Id: Ie8eab88e2a785ae31acb16def04c7021ed604bc6

Revert "Fixed /etc/sahara handling"

This commit reverts "Fixed /etc/sahara handling" (Ic946206dc930072c33e3e976062d5e26fd33f59e),
because of fixed package for Liberty.

Also contains temporarily hack to avoid RPM package problem
with wrong group mode for /etc/sahara folder.

Change-Id: I50d3cf79784c024178c31a790b6c13482787f2bb
Related-bug: #1452698

Add new parameter 'plugins' for Sahara

Sahara keeps posibility to specify, which plugins should be enabled
by using config parameter 'plugins'. When parameter is unset Sahara
will enable all available plugins.

[1] http://docs.openstack.org/kilo/config-reference/content/ch_configuring-sahara.html

Change-Id: Ic2c333a27835d8997a4df0f2138c6d2f9b10360f

Revert "Fix Sahara installation for Ubuntu"

This commit reverts "Fix Sahara installation for Ubuntu" (I4c9e9206e3e60f3c85224ae120516badb331672e)
because bug 1450945 is duplicate for 1452698 and it was fixed for Liberty.

Change-Id: I8e013f52e3dae80764f9d71783f8ebbddc0aa1ae
Related-bug: #1450945
Related-bug: #1452698

Rely on autorequire for config resource ordering

Currently we specify the ordering of config resources wherever it is
necessary based on the presence of the file it will write to, or the
presence of the package in charge of providing the file it will write
to.

Those kind of ordering can be specified directly at the resource level
using the autorequire mechanism. With this patch, any config resource
will make sure the package in charge of providing the file will be
installed first.

Change-Id: I73285227e9bbd0c895d9f74bab9e9bb65acaba40

Remove POSIX file modes.

This patch removes File resources, which should be delivered by packaging
tools. These resources (files and directories with attributes) could be in
conflict with different OS packaging systems, which isn't a desired result.

Change-Id: Ife7d6b061380ea5ddcdf581c22e0fa6b1d31da61
Closes-bug: #1458915

Change defaults value for Sahara Keystone credentials

Rename defaults value for keystone user and keystone tenant name
to be consistent with defaults in keystone::auth class and other
openstack puppet modules.

Change-Id: I4a8e76f9e9d3e45987029c9b2ce3b9f5eb964921

Introduce Sahara extended logging class

There is a range of extended logging options in Openstack services that use
openstack.common.logger (Ceilometer, Cinder, Heat, Keystone, Nova).
Adding ceilometer::logging to support them like it done for puppet-heat,
puppet-ceilometer, puppet-cinder, etc.

Change-Id: I389fabeca8ae3013e44ad3e1a7665118814fc69c

Remove deprecated parameters

This patch removes parameters from main init and keystone::auth
classes, which were marked as deprecated since Kilo release.

Change-Id: I83b35136d066a66756a9620c70ec4e42d22d24a2

db: Use postgresql lib class for psycopg package

This patch introduce the same design than mysql for postgresql
by requiring dedicated lib::python class instead of declaring
a new resource package within sahara module.

Change-Id: I1c9378fb9aba2b4261ab25f4057cccf71560d1a8

Switch Sahara to $::os_service_default

This patch switches Sahara params, which have absent ensure, to
$::os_service_default fact

Change-Id: I66581c897848ff966c96cc0d150fe2e55dac1dd7

Allow customization of db sync command line

Add parameter to sahara::db::sync class to allow end
users to add command line parameters to the db sync command.

Change-Id: I14c177f3df9cd541408ee033638be21fa6e2fb6a
Partial-bug: #1472740

Use $::os_service_default where is possible

This is a second part of switching to $::os_service_default fact.
Switch to $::os_service_default all params, which are possible
to use with $::os_service_default fact.

Related-bug: #1515273

Change-Id: I54609f09998f29e8dffc12ca4591044dbf67b09b

Support of PyMySQL driver for MySQL backend

Add ability to use python-pymysql library as backend for MySQL
connections, and use it as default.

Update acceptance tests to use pyMySQL.

Change-Id: I625f1e6adb5ad581c293431d90d1a9e5578472d4
Docs: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/PyMySQL_evaluation

Remove deprecated parameters since Liberty release

Remove deprecated classes for Ceilo notifications and old configuration
of Sahara service in main init.pp class.

Change-Id: I7690d21cc753975fb3bd681497b29771cc3dd09f

Remove qpid messaging support

Qpid messaging driver is removed from Oslo.messaging [1]
Therefore, we cannot support it anymore.

[1] I4a9cba314c4a2f24307504fa7b5427424268b114

Change-Id: Ic604be82fd3ca1cd595de1f63f151b74502714f2

Fix defaults for doc section

Change defaults to $::os_service_default for parameters, which have
this by default and were missed in main switch commit.

Change-Id: I8335a322f88f3bb45c0d0a5c0de9d9bd7b914f78

Remove require on main init class

Now all Sahara packages are fixed and we don't need use require
for main init.pp class from service classes anymore.

Change-Id: If11b03675ed62f3f56e69cb4fbeb75a3d46a5ab7

Do not show warning on sahara/notify

Remove warning and also move to os_service_default params

Change-Id: Idb7349c7c386a02c5bf1a72d87ccc0f48ee8481d
Closes-bug: #1528964

Remove duplicate params and drop mock

This change removes the duplicate database_max_retries parameter from
the sahara class.

mock is not used anywhere in the module, let's drop it.
This patch will help to hit this bug:
https://launchpad.net/bugs/1492636

Change-Id: I0a3e57c8576e1451be5b0c039ce4f864339d4b5d
Closes-Bug: #1537251

Add the capability to configure api-paste.ini with config.pp

Already added type/provider for paste configs,
but it wouldn't to patch sahara::config.

Change-Id: Iba618f27b110192c1751486681d77c1c9d46c541

Do not raise error when ca_file is not passed

Ca_file is using only to verify clients, we don't need that if we
are not going to use them, so no need to raise error if it is not
passed.

Change-Id: Ib6fd62a3c342adab0cf356d9d62ff5aa0a78ef30

Totally drop Qpid support

Qpid was removed in Mitaka from Oslo Messaging, so now we can
drop it in manifests.

Change-Id: I5f731b7a37c27c8e4ea0775632e7821d54cf12e9

Add support for db_max_retries param

The db_max_retries parameter regulates the number of reconnection
attempts performed after an error raised rather than at startup.

Change-Id: I55a5df7f6ba9cc2d62b745e027f3059b45061352
Closes-Bug: 1579718

Add 'openstack-db' tag to db-sync Exec resource

In order to make easy orchestration on all OpenStack db-sync, add this
tag so people can use this tag in composition layer.
A use case it to set some orchestration to make sure MySQL Galera is
ready before running any Exec with this tag.

Change-Id: I8795a883821949428d3f61e2f74b04ce5592f014

Add kombu_failover_strategy and kombu_compression options

Change-Id: I438f1abe9ddd1074add95bba8752f516b15eaba3

Introduce support for oslo.messaging amqp driver configuration

This commit adds support for the oslo.messaging amqp rpc_backend
which enables the AMQP 1.0 driver. A proposed feature for the
Newton oslo.messaging release is an update to the AMQP 1.0 driver
to support a stateless messaging interconnect for RPC traffic [1].

This patch:
* use oslo::messaging::amqp resource
* add new parameters for the oslo_messaging_amqp driver
* update spec tests for amqp as alternate rpc_backend
* add feature release note

[1] https://blueprints.launchpad.net/oslo.messaging/+spec/amqp-dispatch-router

Change-Id: I7505c51ba690e8d3a7cd8e59628fe21ee9e1dc1d

Deprecate verbose option in logging

Option "verbose" from group "DEFAULT" is deprecated for removal.
The parameter has no effect.
-Deprecated verbose for logging and init
-Remove verbose in README
-Remove verbose from tests.

If this option is not set explicitly, there is no such warning

Change-Id: I1f7a00764f73f2131285667108d80fcde4642e6e

Deprecate use_syslog

[DEFAULT/use_syslog] was deprecated in Mitaka [1]
init.pp/logging.pp - deprecate use_syslog, add warning, remove reference
tests - remove use_syslog and [DEFAULT/use_syslog] verification.

[1]
http://docs.openstack.org/mitaka/config-reference/tables/conf-changes/sahara.html

Change-Id: I3c75a5b824366efb490362a9f4ae6a41e86e0b60

Revert "Deprecate use_syslog"

This option is not deprecated and still actual

This reverts commit 75561b627f6cfcd2611e6d9ac4ebfab55ae2d0e9.

Change-Id: I6a017cc489ac195d02ef1f6b3e9b35e5c06af283

Provide default service_name for keystone endpoint

This change updates the sahara::keystone::auth class to include a default
service_name of 'sahara' so that if a user changes the auth_name, the
service is still created as being related to 'sahara'.  This improves the
user experiance when they want to customize the usernames for services.

Change-Id: I8c6240473213b107de862edf359834b5494e9f74
Closes-Bug: #1590040

Add purge_config option

Add the option in order to facilitate management.
User can ensure that only the options they hoped
are configured.

Change-Id: I36a2073145903d7b7eaaeb49e9cdb15feca95767

Add transport_url parameters for oslo.messaging

This commit adds the transport_url parameters for oslo.messaging. The
url is of the form:

  transport://user:pass@host1:port[,hostN:portN]/virtual_host

Where the transport scheme specifies the rpc or notification backend
as one of rabbit, amqp, zmq, etc. Oslo.messaging is deprecating the
host, port, and auth configuration options [1]. All drivers will get
these options via the transport_url.

This patch:
* use oslo::messaging::default resource
* use oslo::messaging::notifications resource
* add parameters for transport_url(s)
* update spec tests
* add feature release note

[1] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/317285/

Change-Id: If5f30ba1944d897d2dd63539f4bb8a80e6c46c5e

Switch to use oslo::zmq messaging

Change-Id: I77f9fe010c963da51736c651ccc4648367000b86

Add memcached_servers for keystone authtoken

This change adds the abiltity to manage the memcached servers for the
keystone authtoken configuration in sahara

Change-Id: I619cbfe471fe3d49a165ed87c6c4664375effc90

Include openstacklib defaults manifest.

This provides a mechanism for setting default across all modules.

Change-Id: Iefb386137aac7a6cd3f24eddaf96b827f010c7c1
Related-Bug: 1599113

Fix puppet-lint before upgrading gem

Removing puppet-lint warnings
in favor of upgrading to latest gem

2016-09-13 21:14:52.263943 | manifests/init.pp:453:WARNING: indentation of => is not properly aligned (expected in column 16, but found it in column 15)

Change-Id: I3d374511c6d3bd83ba2c563c4d5bb6a99c1cfbe7

Remove verbose

Since we are in Ocata we should remove the
verbose option that was deprecated

Change-Id: I8117189299ac95aa0383115bbff3d5edcec8455b

Added retries for db_sync

If db sync fails, it is never retried leading to errors. So, this
patch adds retries for db_sync to avoid sync fails.

Change-Id: Ib7162c07542d9c8c81ed35f931a2b91281610774
Closes-Bug: #1628580

Fix documentation for log_dir parameter

Change-Id: Ia0be1a31ec59752ebac6430446aebcb766f350c4
Partial-Bug: #1600294

Change worker defaults to ::os_workers

This patch changes the default worker count from ::processorcount to the
new ::os_workers fact. ::os_workers is based on the number of processors
(currently cpu/4) but is capped at a maximum of 8 worker processors.
This is a much more reasonable default in general and prevents excessive
resource consumption on systems with a large number of CPUs. Also remove
some unnecessary processorcount facts for tests that do not test them.

Change-Id: I96d4ced9955a72a726b7f35b4d5470affc49f4ff

Add default_ntp_server configuration  option

Sahara supports being able to configure the default ntp server for the
cluster instances. This change adds in the configuration value so that a
user can specify the default_ntp_server configuration.

Change-Id: I13aafbf87a0ed4b14797ab2a280318f007481d75
Closes-Bug: #1638676

Deprecate rabbitmq connection parameters

The rabbitmq connection parameters have been deprecated in favor of the
transport_url setting.

Change-Id: Ie57d24313b4d25e371c7462b823aa5fe163f7476
Related-Bug: #1625198

Add hooks for external install & svc management

This adds defined anchor points for external modules to hook into the
software install, config and service dependency chain.  This allows
external modules to manage software installation (virtualenv,
containers, etc) and service management (pacemaker) without needing rely
on resources that may change or be renamed.

Change-Id: I02a1b403be780b344d436d9b00e649d7e878a53b

Deprecated enable_notifications and notification_level

The 'enable' option has been removed in sahara, and
the 'level' option does not in the oslo.messaging,
so we should deprecate enable_notifications and
notification_level, and set the notification_driver
 if you wish to enable sahara notifications.

Change-Id: Ibbe5329d621cb6f88787d8943d09749c5ac938f5
Closes-Bug: #1621853

Add oslo::db to dependency chain

All db settings should be applied and all releated packages should be
installed before dbsync starts.

Change-Id: I8cb525d112a19ce954004e54633b34162d5485c4

Add rpc_response_timeout option

Add rpc_response_timeout to configure seconds time for waiting
for a response from a call.

Change-Id: Iffb1d1baa780bd37c30d4d8938bbcf5b4462d324

Add support for keystone authtoken parameters

Deprecate old v2 parameters in ::sahara and introduce the classic
authtoken class, for v3 parameters.

Make it backward compatible with pick function, like we did in
puppet-trove.

Change-Id: I6502b314841007a1bec2a64574260b41b4281220

Remove deprecated notification parameters

Deprecate rabbit_max_retries option

Option "rabbit_max_retries" from group "oslo_messaging_rabbit" is
deprecated for removal. Its value may be silently ignored in the future.

Remove deprecated keystone authtoken signing_dir option

Change-Id: Iec24bc4d77fffdcdda56710691d85e15f3ba9e83

Deprecate oslo.messaging rpc_backend option parameter

Oslo.messaging uses the transport_url to represent the rpc and
notification messaging driver to use and its full configuration. The
rpc_backend configuration option is deprecated for removal and
should not gate oslo.messaging driver configuration options.

This patch:
* deprecate rpc_backend
* remove conditional check
* update spec tests
* add release note

Change-Id: Ic283faf4f04a9fc434a6cc1fa530ea25b2eda430
Closes-Bug: #1708976

Deprecate revocation_cache_time option

The revocation_cache_time is deprecated for removel because of PKI
token format is no longer supported.
Update warning message and add a release note.

Change-Id: Id17d4e5c6079fffe04372fe0d1d86c7e2267f7c0
Closes-Bug: #1717144

Add deps to all that is needed

Change-Id: Ie9d806ecb4db0ad8f7fe227b65cd4654f7183dba

Configure *_domain_name to Default by default

Keystone v2.0 API was removed so we have no choice but configuring
user_domain_name and project_domain_name otherwise it fallbacks to
Keystone v2.0 and it fails. This patch sets the default value so we make
sure Keystone v3 will be used out of the box for our users.

Change-Id: I3291b3176dd818641c90a17150a06e640b119fa2

Accept empty strings for log_dir

An empty string is an acceptable value of this entry, and it forces
logging to stdout/stderr, which is useful when running on containers.

Change-Id: I2b34ab79dd7995f7496e5889c3ec1791d6c75183

Deprecate use_neutron option

Nova network has been fully removed from the OpenStack codebase.
As such, all instances of switches on use_neutron should be removed,
as the functionality will never be meaningful.

Change-Id: I4d9d21ea3b5090d4cb2822c0a95d819026578ccd
Depends-On: Ib9d87dd339d637b69fb27315d92228cbc523c8eb
Closes-Bug: #1734613

Expose use_json logging option

It enables JSON-formatted logging from oslo.log.

Change-Id: If14563da6d259c68c8d5df97ba8802acfd1bbb83

Add group to policy management

The move of policy.json into code means the file may not exist. We've
added support to ensure that the file exists in the openstacklib but we
need to make sure the permissions are right for each service. This adds
the group information to the policies so it works right.

Depends-On: I26e8b1384f4f69712da9d06a4c565dfd1f17c9ed

Add use_journal option for logging configuration

This enables oslo.log to pass logging records to journald.

Add pool_timeout option to configure this value for pool_timeout with

Add Sahara API WSGI support

Adds support for running the Sahara API under WSGI with Apache.
Ubuntu Bionic has removed support for eventlet which means you must
use WSGI now. See bug [1] [2]

[1] https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/sahara/+bug/1786214
[2] https://bugs.launchpad.net/puppet-sahara/+bug/1765453
